summary: Dark Elf Follower with UNP, CBBE, 7Base options
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][color=#6aa84f][size=6]Nera
[/size][/color][/font]
(Candlelight)

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/6ezspxhxj/20160827133422_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/kwe5vkyrr/Info.png[/img]
[font=Verdana]Name:  Nera
Race:  Dark Elf
Height:  1
Weight:  .89
Voice:  Female Dark Elf
Marriageable:  Yes
Body:  UNP, CBBE, & SeveNBase options
Location:  Windhelm - New Gnisis Corner Club

Skin:  Fair Skin (Uncompressed & Optimized Versions)
*Uncompressed Used In Screenshots*

Weapon:  Axestaff - Aldmeri Version
Armor:  R18Pn09 - Shanoa Armor

Combat Class:  Combat Spellsword
Combat Style:  Default

Levels with Player.  Dark Elf traits/bonuses.
Bonuses to all magic, Sneak, & 2 Hand

ENB:  RealVision
Tested with EFF[/font]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/q8bwimvbb/20160826133616_1.jpg[/img]
